get.summary: Returns state of AgeUSD at this moment

post.summary: Creates a new payment request. Will return request id to check for transaction state and ergopay url to show the user as QR code

get.summary: Returns the state of a payment request. Please note that payment requests are purged after some time, so persist the state at your side when needed

parameters.description: Set to true to show unreachable peers in the list

parameters.description: Set to true to show peers not open to be connected
parameters.name: closedApi

Lists all token prices and available volume
